fullplot: Anthony Burgess created the primitive language for the early humans in this prehistoric adventure about a trio of warriors who travel the savanna, encountering sabre-toothed tigers, mammoths and cannibalistic tribes in search of a flame that would replace the fire their tribe has lost.
plot: This story takes place in prehistoric time when three prehistoric tribesmen search for a new fire source.
title: Quest for Fire

tomatoes.consensus: Its characters can't do much more than grunt, but that doesn't keep Quest for Fire from offering a deeply resonant -- and surprisingly funny -- look at the beginning of the human race.

writers: J.H. Rosny Sr. (based on the novel by)
